text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse You had a meeting.  Nothing was accomplished.  You’ve obdicated testing to the states, yet you imply in this tweet you and your so called task force is actually doing testing.  The #COVID19 NUMBERS ARE NOT declining In the USA.  #TrumpLiesPeopleDie
